page.title: Welcome to Industry Core Hub
page.subtitle: The Eclipse Tractus-X KITs & Use Cases Speed Way
page.description: Enable or disable specific features within a KIT to unlock the complete potential of dataspaces.
page.exploreCarousel: Explore the carousel below to discover available features.

industryCore.name: Industry Core KIT
industryCore.description: Core functionality for industrial data management, partner discovery, and catalog management.

catalogManagement.name: Provide Catalog/Type Parts
catalogManagement.description: Provide, Share and Manage Parts in Catalog / Type Level.

serializedParts.name: Provide Serialized/Instance Parts
serializedParts.description: Provide, Share and Manage Parts in Serialized / Instance Level

dataspaceDiscovery.name: Consume Data via Dataspace Discovery
dataspaceDiscovery.description: Search, Discover and Visualize Digital Twins & Submodels from your partners connected to the same dataspace as you

businessPartner.name: Business Partner KIT
businessPartner.description: Comprehensive business partners data management, contact list and validation of participants.

participants.name: Contact List
participants.description: Manage your simple dataspace partner contact list, to enable easier consumption and collaboration.

ecoPass.name: Eco Pass KIT
ecoPass.description: Leverage the transparency of digital product passports to strengthen sustainability & compliance.

passConsumption.name: Passport Consumption & Visualization
passConsumption.description: Retrieve passport from a dataspace participant via QR code or ID and display it.

passProvision.name: Passport Provision & Management
passProvision.description: Create, manage, and share digital product passports with dataspace partners.

dataGovernance.name: Data Governance KIT
dataGovernance.description: Manage your data sovereignty, policies, contracts, compliance, and governance.

pcf.name: PCF KIT
pcf.description: Product Carbon Footprint calculation and lifecycle assessment tools.

dataChain.name: Data Chain KIT
dataChain.description: Access data distributed across the dataspace.

dcm.name: DCM KIT
dcm.description: Demand and Capacity Management for optimizing supply chain operations.

traceability.name: Traceability KIT
traceability.description: End-to-end traceability of parts, alerts and components throughout the supply chain.
